name: Yatzy Classic (itch)
description: The game is very easy to run with opponents in the game in this application.  Just select some dice numbers and tap start to shuffle.  Increase the points in your wins in this dice or yatzy classic game to get your level advantage over your opponents.  Choose an easier or harder level according to your ability to play in the page menu.  Select and randomize the dice numbers and continue until your highest excellence points value
